name: CIQRCodeDescriptor.ErrorCorrectionLevel
desc: Constants that indicate the percentage of the symbol dedicated to error correction.

items.name: case levelL
items.desc: Low-percentage error correction: 20% of the symbol data is dedicated to error correction.

items.name: case levelM
items.desc: Medium-percentage error correction: 37% of the symbol data is dedicated to error correction.

items.name: case levelQ
items.desc: High-percentage error correction: 55% of the symbol data is dedicated to error correction.

items.name: case levelH
items.desc: Very-high-percentage error correction: 65% of the symbol data is dedicated to error correction.
